welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hackensack, the charming city known for its bustling downtown, diverse culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue Airways and its partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport for up to 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and a comfortable waiting area.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly Delta Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest and busiest at JFK, serving mainly international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
